EmailTemplate.name: Version5 Training.Reminder (Tomorrow) - West Metro
EmailTemplate.subject: Reminder: VisiCAD 5.2 Training Tomorrow (6/19)
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
STAY CONNECTED <http://www.facebook.com/pages/Tritech-Software-Systems/89416081839> VisiCAD 5.2 Training Complimentary regional training - Tomorrow Hello {{lead.First Name:default=Sir/Madam}},
This is your confirmation that you are registered for the VisiCAD 5.2 Regional Training. Another reminder email will be sent to you the day before training. We look forward to seeing you.
Date and Location: Tuesday, June 19 West Metro Fire 433 South Allison Pkwy Lakewood, CO 80226 Click here to view map <http://g.co/maps/58pdc>
Agenda:
8:00 AM - 12:00 NOON VisiCAD 5.2 Functionality and Demonstration
12:00 NOON - 1:30 PM Complimentary Lunch will be provided
1:30 PM - 3:30 PM System Planning and Question and Answer Session with Technical Services
Bonus: Continental breakfast and lunch will be provided.
Question? Gladys Ferguson, Training Supervisor TriTech Software Systems (858) 799-7383 gladys.ferguson@tritech.com
